TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DocumentSetVersion extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents metadata that is associated with a major or minor version of the object and its files.

remarks.para: A DocumentSetVersion stores two main snapshot aspects for the document set at the time of capture: the set of metadata fields and corresponding values, and the list of versions for the items in the object.

For the fields, only those belonging to the content type of a DocumentSet are captured. Hidden or read-only fields are not captured. The following types in a enumeration are not captured: Attachments, Calculated, Computed, and PageSeparator.

As for the items, a DocumentSetVersion object is a snapshot because only the version labels for the items are stored. When restoring a DocumentSet to the specified DocumentSetVersion, the system uses the item’s underlying object to retrieve the version. So, if the item or the SPListItemVersion that corresponds to the stored label was deleted, the current item will not be restored.
objects must be retrieved from a object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Comments As String
public: property System::String ^ Comments { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the comments for the snapshot.
Docs.value: Text entered as comments when the snapshot is captured.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Created As DateTime
public: property DateTime Created { DateTime get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets when the snapshot was captured.

remarks.para: The date and time are in UTC format.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CreatedBy As String
public: property System::String ^ CreatedBy { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the of the Microsoft.SharePoint.SPUser object that captured the snapshot.
Docs.value: An value of that represents the user who captured the snapshot.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Delete() cil managed

Docs.summary: Deletes the snapshot of the document set version ( object).

remarks.para: Deletes the snapshot from the parent collection and invalidates the current object such that the properties and methods no longer hold past information.
Uses with Contributor role permissions can use this method. Specifically, these users must have SPBasePermissions.EditListItems permissions.

Docs.exception: There is no such object in the collection. (When calling this method on a snapshot that has already been deleted.)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.List`1<valuetype Microsoft.Office.DocumentManagement.DocumentSets.DocumentSetVersionItem> GetDisplayContents() cil managed
Public Function GetDisplayContents () As List(Of DocumentSetVersionItem)

Docs.summary: Gets information about the snapshot items.
Docs.returns: A list of objects for every object captured in the snapshot.

remarks.para: Call this method to get the document set item information for subsequent output to the user. This method sets the DocumentSetVersionItem.Title property to the item's file name without extension. It also sets the DocumentSetVersionItem.ItemUrl property to the item's Url property. If the item that was originally captured by this snapshot has been deleted since capture, the aforementioned DocumentSetVersionItem properties will not be set.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.List`1<valuetype Microsoft.Office.DocumentManagement.DocumentSets.DocumentSetVersionField> GetDisplayFields() cil managed
Public Function GetDisplayFields () As List(Of DocumentSetVersionField)

Docs.summary: Gets the document set snapshot metadata fields with titles and values formatted to the locale.
Docs.returns: A list of objects for every document set metadata field captured in the snapshot as formatted to the current locale.

remarks.para: Call this method to get the document set metadata for subsequent output to the user. This method formats the titles and values specifically for the current locale. If the field that was originally captured by this snapshot has been deleted since, no formatting will occur.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsLastMajor As Boolean
public: property bool IsLastMajor { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets whether only the latest checked in major versions of a object are captured by this snapshot.
Docs.value: true if the snapshot captured the latest checked-in major versions; false, when the captured versions are the latest checked in minor or major versions

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ParentCollection As DocumentSetVersionCollection

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of objects to which this document set snapshot belongs.
Docs.value: A object that represents the collection of document set snapshots to which this snapshot belongs.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VersionLabel As String
public: property System::String ^ VersionLabel { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the version number of the snapshot.
Docs.value: A object that contains an integer number.

remarks.para: The value is auto-assigned by the parent collection when snapshot is captured.
